item.description:
Come play ultimate frisbee!

We've had a great turn out in August, and I hope it continues into September.

I've scheduled Wednesday nights for this month, but as daylight gets shorter we might want to consider meeting on a weekend during the day.

Email me if you have a weekend time preference and I'll see when most people can make it.

See you soon!
item.how_to_find_us: We gather near the big, white arch.

group.name: The Salem Ultimate Frisbee Meetup Group

item.name: Ultimate Game
